attributes.action: We condemn the UK government for its illegal bombing of Syria on the 14th April.
attributes.additional_details: The raid took place on the very day that inspectors from the Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons were due to arrive in Syria in order to determine whether or not chemical weapons had even been used, this in itself should have enough to discourage what was a totally irresponsible action by the UK government.
attributes.background: The UK government took part in a bombing raid against Syria on the 14th April 2018, this was in violation of international law, it was also done without consultation with the UK parliament and without showing the UK public any credible evidence of President Assad's wrongdoing.
